commit.message:
Rollup merge of #64031 - Centril:param-attrs-no-macros-test, r=nikomatsakis

Harden `param_attrs` test wrt. usage of a proc macro `#[attr]`

The `param-attrs-builtin-attrs.rs` test file uses the `#[test]` attribute which should cover this but `#[test]` isn't a proc macro attribute so we add another test to be on the safe side. This intends to address https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/64010#issuecomment-526564316.

r? @nikomatsakis

cc @c410-f3r @petrochenkov
cc https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/60406

verification.payload:
tree dc829f6e707b97ffd132ab4f98ff2e9b055aa151
parent 9718f7a09fc9c5b97f8b2c873faf87ba86c11fc6
parent 5187a3e15723c85cd7ef3418b0c0e61c79709f4c
author Mazdak Farrokhzad <twingoow@gmail.com> 1567648779 +0200
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1567648779 +0200

Rollup merge of #64031 - Centril:param-attrs-no-macros-test, r=nikomatsakis

Harden `param_attrs` test wrt. usage of a proc macro `#[attr]`

The `param-attrs-builtin-attrs.rs` test file uses the `#[test]` attribute which should cover this but `#[test]` isn't a proc macro attribute so we add another test to be on the safe side. This intends to address https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/64010#issuecomment-526564316.

r? @nikomatsakis

cc @c410-f3r @petrochenkov
cc https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/60406

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+// force-host
+// no-prefer-dynamic
+
+#![crate_type = "proc-macro"]
+
+extern crate proc_macro;
+
+use proc_macro::TokenStream;
+
+#[proc_macro_attribute]
+pub fn id(_: TokenStream, input: TokenStream) -> TokenStream { input }

@@ -0,0 +1,228 @@
+error[E0658]: the attribute `id` is currently unknown to the compiler and may have meaning added to it in the future
